channel.title: Engineer update hidden photos, possibly new abillity?
channel.description:
looking at this: [url]https://www.teamfortress.com/engineerupdate/engineer_photos/[/url]
make me thing that it could be the last part of the update left. And I thinked Awesome now I can move mah things over the map, What do you think about this?

item.title: Engineer update hidden photos, possibly new abillity?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Victus:

I doubt they’ll let you pack up the sentry that fast. And it’s simply a pleasing versatility for defense and offense. And makes the character a more viable threat.

To be trully I’ve been playing and is hell fast to pack up the things, just 1 second.

mattemuse:

it also means you can build and upgrade your turret in a safe location, and then carry it to the frontline without worrying about it being blown up while it’s in construction.

to be trully if you upgrade it and you move it it will deploy as level 1 and go evolving by itself, if you are moving a level 3 sentry the enemy has over 5 seconds to blow it up before getting ready to shoot, if a level 4 sentry they have over 3 seconds, a level 1 sentry 2-2,5 seconds…

Read full topic
item.source: Engineer update hidden photos, possibly new abillity?

item.title: Engineer update hidden photos, possibly new abillity?
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
Hit your special command (playing as the engi) while standing over one of your sentry’s and you will pick it up. It works on any upgrade level, and any deployable device.

Read full topic
item.source: Engineer update hidden photos, possibly new abillity?

item.title: Engineer update hidden photos, possibly new abillity?
item.dc:creator: The_Minotaur
item.description:
I think that it might get a bit unbalanced unless they make it take time for the engineer to unload it again.

That Wrangler looks very fun though.

Read full topic
item.source: Engineer update hidden photos, possibly new abillity?

item.title: Engineer update hidden photos, possibly new abillity?
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
mechaelite:

that’s just what I thinked before but it will also be useful for defending as you can change the place of your sentry away of some demoman sticky bombs.

I doubt they’ll let you pack up the sentry that fast. And it’s simply a pleasing versatility for defense and offense. And makes the character a more viable threat.
